DOC.brief_summary: Nocturnal calf cramp common complaint patient lumbar spinal stenosis . The purpose study evaluate effect botulinum toxin A injection gastrocnemius muscle lumbar spinal stenosis patient receive conservative therapy . We compare pain score , insomnia severity , functional ability , patient satisfaction , neurophysiological variable change use electrical stimulator control ( conservative management spinal stenosis ) botox group ( conservative management spinal stenosis plus botox injection gastrocnemius muscle ) .
DOC.brief_title: Botulinum Toxin Type A Injection Into Gastrocnemius Muscle Treatment Nocturnal Calf Cramps Patients With Lumbar Spinal Stenosis
DOC.criteria: 1. diagnosed lumbar spinal stenosis MRI find 2. nocturnal calf cramp symptom least per week 1. electrolyte disorder 2. congenital muscle disease 3. muscle cramp relate medication ( statin , diuretic , calcium channel blocker , anticonvulsant etc . ) 4. cognitive impairment
